column5: Anybody know the current situation with the road construction west of Dryden on 17? Went through there the beginning of June and it was a mess. Had some long waits due to construction. Leave again the end of this month and just trying to figure out what to take for route. Want to avoid the long waits we had earlier this year. Thanks. VANT
Went from Vermillion Bay to Dryden Saturday and everything was finished.
The road was done when we went the end of June. They also have the big Billboard done at Vermillion Bay with a picture of you holding my big Walleye.
Was through there on Wednesday (July 21) and stopped twice, in my case it problably only added 15 minutes to the trip.
